job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pLooking for a System Engineer to help build and support the ultimate voicebased conversational AI Were looking for coders and creators with a refined code sense people whove built cool things but also enjoy scaling and operating those things and who feel proud seeing their code run well in productionppThe ideal candidates would have professional experience on a stack serving millions of users be proficient with Python andor Golang and have some amount of experience either professional or personal in NLPppnbspppstrongDesirable Skills Include strongMicroservices Architecture GoPythonML OpsShould be able to apply different tenants configuration through code as well as toolsppnbspppstrongExperiencestrong35 years of experience in working with infrastructure as codenbspAt least 1 year in Python or GolangComfortable developing maintaining DevOps pipelinesStrong experience working with cloud services  AWS or GCP preferred Exposure to NLPAIML is a huge plusppbrppResponsibilitiespp Be part of oncall rotation to respond to urgent bugs or production outagespp Proactively identify and fix infrastructure bottlenecksnbsppp Choosing tooling for and understanding of CI  CDGCP knowledgepp Kubernetes In a production environmentDockerKnowledge of working in an Agile environment infrastructure As CodeDevelop integrate and support features in the core server stackpp Develop and support data pipeline and infrastructureppbrppThis is onsite position post Covid in Austin TXppPermanent position on W2 onlyp
